name: RP2
description:
A couple nights ago my friends and I went hard in the paint and decided that making visual novels was the best way to release our intense emotions. So I guess it was kind of a game jam? Definitely a fun thing between friends. I'm uploading it here to share with a couple more friends and I hope you enjoy it as much as I enjoyed making it! 

This doesn't have any really complex feelings or anything, this is very much a short joke game that I'm very proud of!

It's been awhile since Scorpions, a very fond memory of mine! I've gone from high school senior to college freshmen! I hope you have a great day!
